title: The Flagship Open AGI Summit Returns to Denver Amid a Global Surge in Open-Source AI
description: The Open AGI Summit, a leading open source AI conference, will convene in Denver on February 19, 2025, for a full day of programming addressing one of technology’s defining questions: should Artificial General Intelligence be controlled by a handful of corporations, or built openly by the researchers, engineers, and communities who believe intelligence should be […]

title: SpaceX, OpenAI Drive 20% Gain in Blackstone Fund for the Wealthy
description: Blackstone Inc.’s private equity fund for wealthy individuals notched a net 20% gain last year, thanks in part to some artificial intelligence investments the firm doesn’t hold in its institutional portfolios.
content:
Blackstone Inc.’s private equity fund for wealthy individuals notched a net 20% gain last year, thanks in part to some artificial intelligence investments the firm doesn’t hold in its institutional portfolios.

title: Pete Davidson and Casey Affleck Film to Use AI to 'Adjust Performances,' Create Set Locations
description: An upcoming movie by director Doug Liman and set to star Pete Davidson and Casey Affleck has published a notice that artificial intelligence will be used to "adjust" actor performances and to create set locations and backgrounds.
content:

title: Study tech if you want to work in banking, says NatWest chief
description: Lender has invested £1.2bn in artificial intelligence and simplification in cost-cutting push
content:
Young people should study tech rather than traditional subjects like maths and finance if they want a career in banking, the boss of NatWest has said.
Paul Thwaite, the chief executive, said banks were looking for “very different” graduates from thos... [2353 chars]

title: Bharat Bodh AI Conclave: IIT-B & Columbia University forge strategic partnership for industrial AI innovation
description: At the Bharat Bodhan AI Conclave 2026, a landmark partnership was forged between IIT Bombay and Columbia University to establish a joint centre for artificial intelligence in manufacturing.
content: The landscape of industrial innovation in India has received a significant boost with a new international partnership forged at the Bharat Bodhan AI Conclave 2026. During the inaugural ceremony at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi, a landmark memorandum o... [2983 chars]

title: Meta Plans 'Name Tag' Facial Recognition for Ray-Ban Smart Glasses
description: Meta plans to add a facial recognition feature to its Ray-Ban smart glasses as soon as this year, reports The New York Times ($). According to people involved in the plans who spoke to the publication, the feature is internally called "Name Tag," and would let wearers identify people and get information about them via Meta's artificial intelligence assistant. Mark Zuckerberg reportedly wants the feature to differentiate the devices and to make the AI assistant in the glasses more useful.
content:
Meta plans to add a facial recognition feature to its Ray-Ban smart glasses as soon as this year, reports The New York Times ($).
According to people involved in the plans who spoke to the publication, the feature is internally called "Name Tag," and... [3483 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Global Markets Waver as AI Disruption and U.S. Inflation Loom
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
